other_tests.findings: Liver massively enlarged, measuring up to 28 cm, with hypodense attenuation possibly indicating fatty deposition; trace perihepatic fluid with extensive stranding possibly reflecting hepatitis. Enlarged spleen measuring up to 15 cm. The appendix is abnormally thickened and dilated up to 1 cm, concerning for early acute appendicitis. Scattered retroperitoneal nodes; a left periaortic node unchanged, a portacaval node enlarged.
other_tests.changes_over_time: One left periaortic node unchanged, a portacaval node enlarged.
